Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Imaphi amanye amaphepha adingekayo ukuapulayela i{vehicle finance}?
Explanation: Udinga i{proof} Yomazisi, i{address} yokuhlala, iholo ({income}) kanye ne mvume yomlingani ({spouse}) uma ushade ngokuhlanganyela, kanye futhi ne layisense yokushayela ukuaplayela i{vehicle finance}

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Imaphi kulamaphepha owadingayo uma uaplayela i{vehicle finance}?
Explanation: Udinga i{proof} Yomazisi, i{address} yokuhlala, iholo ({income}) kanye ne mvume yomlingani ({spouse}) uma ushade ngokuhlanganyela, kanye futhi ne layisense yokushayela ukuaplayela i{vehicle finance}

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Imaphi kulamaphepha ongawadingi ukuaplayela i{vehicle finance}?
Explanation: Awudingi isitifiketi sika {Matric} ukuaplayela i{vehicle finance} kodwa uyayidinga i{proof} yokuhlala kanye ne layisense yokushayela

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Uma ushade ngokuhlanganyela ({community of property}) udinga imvume ebhalwe ngumlingani ({spouse}) ukuaplayela iskweletu
Explanation: Uma ushade ngokuhlanganyela ({community of property}) udinga imvume ebhalwe ngumlingani ({spouse}) wakho ukuze ukwazi ukungena esivumelwaneni se {vehicle finance}

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Udinga imvume ebhalwe ngumlingani ({spouse}) wakho uma ushadile ukuze uthole ifinance yemoto________
Explanation: Abantu abashade ngokuhlanganyela ({community of property}) badinga imvume ebhalwe ngumlingani ({spouse}) wabo ukuze bengene esivumelwaneni ({contract}) se {vehicle finance}

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Udinga imvume kumlingani wakho uma i{vehicle finance} ibiza ngaphezulu kuka {R500,000}
Explanation: Abantu abashade ngomshado wokuhlanganyela badinga imvume ebhaliwe kumlingani ({spouse}) ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuze bakwazi ukungena kusivumelwano se {vehicle finance} senani ({value}) noma liphi

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Kwenzekani uma isicelo ({application}) se {vehicle finance} sivunyelwe?
Explanation: Uma ngabe isicelo ({application}) sakho sivunyelwe, usenokukhetha ukusithatha isikweletu noma cha. Awukangeni kusivumelwano uma ungaka sayini ({sign})

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Uma isicelo ({application}) sakho semali sivunyelwe, ulindelwe ukuthi usayine {sign} isivumelwano bese uthenga imoto
Explanation: Uma ngabe isicelo ({application}) sakho sivunyelwe, usenokukhetha ukusithatha isikweletu noma cha. Awukangeni kusivumelwano uma ungaka sayini ({sign})

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Ukuvunyelwa kwesicelo ({application}) sakho kufana nokusayina {Signing} isivumelwano semoto ({vehicle finance}).
Explanation: Uma ngabe isicelo ({application}) sakho sivunyelwe, usenokukhetha ukusithatha isikweletu noma cha. Awukangeni kusivumelwano uma ungaka sayini ({sign})

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Uma ngabe isicelo ({application}) sakho singavunyelwanga, umbolekisi wemali ({credit provider})_______
Alternative 2: Angeke bavume ukuthi uaplaye ngesikhathi esizayo
Explanation: Ngokwe {National Credit Act}, unelungelo lokubuza ukuthi umbolekisi wezimali ({credit Provider}) akasivumanga ngani isicelo sesikweletu ({credit application})

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Uma isicelo semali yemoto ({vehicle finance}) yakho singavunyelwe kudinga uaplayele ku {NCR} ukuthola ukuthi kungani
Explanation: Ngokwe {National Credit Act}, unelungelo lokubuza ukuthi umbolekisi wezimali ({credit Provider}) akasivumanga ngani isicelo sesikweletu ({credit application})

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Uzokwazi ukuthi isicelo semali yemoto ({vehicle finance}) asivunywanga uma ungezwa lutho kumbolekisi wemali
Explanation: Ngokwe {National Credit Act}, unelungelo lokubuza ukuthi umbolekisi wezimali ({credit Provider}) akasivumanga ngani isicelo sesikweletu ({credit application})

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Ngaphezulu kwama {instalment} ezinyanga, kumele ubeke imali yezindleko njengo {petrol}, umshwalense nokulungiswa kwemoto
Explanation: Imoto ibiza ngaphezulu kwezindleko zenyanga - udinga nemali yokuthi ihlale isebenza

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Ngaphezulu kwama {instalment} enyanga emoto, kufanele ubeke imali yani?
Explanation: Imoto ibiza ngaphezulu kwezindleko zenyanga - udinga nemali yokuthi ihlale isebenza

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Uma uhlela ukuthenga imoto into ofanele uwongele ama{instalments} enyanga.
Explanation: Imoto ibiza ngaphezulu kwezindleko zenyanga - udinga nemali yokuthi ihlale isebenza e.g. i{fuel}, Umshwalenze, I-sevisi, nokunye nokunye.

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Uma uthenga imoto esisebenzile, kubalulekile ukuthi uhlole ini?
Explanation: Ngokuya nge {Consumer Protection Act}, umthengisi kufanele akutshele amaphutha kodwa nawe kufanele uzibhekele ngokuphelele

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Uma imoto esisebenzile inawo umlando wesevisi kuzokhombisa ukuthi imoto ibiphethwe kahle
Explanation: Ngokuya nge {Consumer Protection Act}, umthengisi kufanele akutshele amaphutha kodwa nawe kufanele uzibhekele ngokuphelele

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Uma uthenga imoto esisebenzile, kungumsebenzi wakho ukuthi uhlole imoto ngokuphelele
Explanation: Ngokuya nge {Consumer Protection Act}, umthengisi kufanele akutshele amaphutha kodwa nawe kufanele uzibhekele ngokuphelele

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Ngaphambi kokusayina isivumelwano semali kufanele uzwisise imigomo nemibandela ({Term and Conditions}) ngokuphelele
Explanation: Incwadi yesivumelwano semali isemthethweni kanti iyakubopha ngakho ke kubalulekile ukuthi uyizwisise ngaphambili kokuthi uyisayine ({sign})

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Ngaphambili kokusayina isivumelwano se mali, yini ofanele uqiniseke ukuthi uyayizwisisa?
Alternative 2: Uma ngabe i{rate} yenzalo yakho iyashintsha
Explanation: Incwadi yesivumelwano semali isemthethweni kanti iyakubopha ngakho ke kubalulekile ukuthi uyizwisise ngaphambili kokuthi uyisayine ({sign})

Concept: Applying for and accepting vehicle finance
Question content: Asikho isidingo sokukhathazeka ukuthi une {Balloon} kuze kufike ekugcineni kwesivumelwano sakho semali
Explanation: Kufanele uqiniseke ukuthi unayo noma awunayo unkhokhelo/Ukukhokha kwe{Balloon} ngaphambili kokusayina isivumelwano semali ukuze ungathuki ekugcineni

Question content: Yini i{vehicle finance} yakho {instalments}?
Explanation: i{Instalment} imali yemoto oyikhokhayo njalo ngenyanga kanti ifaka nenzalo nemali yenyanga yesevisi.

Question content: Yini i{Vehicle finance} {instalment}?
Explanation: i{Instalment} imali yemoto oyikhokhayo njalo ngenyanga kanti ifaka nenzalo nemali yenyanga yesevisi.

Question content: Ungakhetha ukuthi ufuna ukukhokha malini njalo ngenyanga
Explanation: Kufanele ubhadale inani le {instalment} ekusivumelwano se {vehicle finance}

Question content: i{SA Reserve Bank} ibeka isilinganiso ({{rate}}) sokubolekana njengomgomo wokubolekisana ngemali kwama {bank} ebantwini
Explanation: i{{Prime rate}} yokubolekisana ngemali iyi {benchmark rate} ekuyisiinganiso esibekwa yi {SA Reserve Bank} ekubolekiseni imali

Question content: Libizwa ukuthi yini igama le {rate} ewumgomo ebekwa i{SA Reserve bank} kuma {banks} ngokubolekisana nemali kubantu?
Explanation: i{Prime rate} yokubolekisana ngemali iyi {benchmark rate} ekuyisiIinganiso esibekwa yi {SA Reserve Bank} ekubolekiseni imali

Question content: i{{Repo rate}} iyi{benchmark} ebekwe yi{SA Reserve Bank} kuma {bank} ukuze aboleke ngayo imali kubantu
Explanation: i{Prime rate} yokubolekisana ngemali iyi {benchmark rate} ekuyisiinganiso esibekwa yi {SA Reserve Bank} ekubolekiseni imali

Question content: Ku sivumelwano se {vehicle finance}, kune {rate} ye inzalo e{{fixed }} ne {{Linked}}/{{Variable}}
Explanation: Zimbili izinhlobo ze {rate} yenzalo kusivumelwano se {vehicle finance}, zibizwa nge {fixed} ne {variable}/i{linked} interest rates

Question content: Ku sivumelwano se {vehicle finance}, kune rate yenzalo e{{fixed}} nenjani futhi?
Explanation: Zimbili izinhlobo ze {rate} yenzalo kusivumelwano se {vehicle finance}, zibizwa nge {fixed} ne {variable}/i{linked} interest rates

Question content: Ku sivumelwano se {vehicle finance}, kune rate yenzalo ehlanganisiwe/ehlukanisiwe {{Linked}}/{{Variable}}_________
Explanation: Zimbili izinhlobo ze {rate} yenzalo kusivumelwano se {vehicle finance}, zibizwa nge {fixed} ne {variable}/i{linked} interest rates

Question content: Iziphi izinhlobo ezimbili ze-interest rate ezikunkontilaka {contract} ye-vehicle finance ongakhetha kuzona?
Explanation: Izinhlobo ezimbili zama {interest rate} esivumelwano se vehicle finance yi {fixed} ne {variable}/i{linked} interest rates

Question content: Inhlobo yiphi ye-interest rate ehlala ifana zinyanga zonke?
Explanation: i{Interest rate} engajiki ({fixed}) ihlala ifana zinyanga zonke kanti ayithintwa yi {prime lending rate}

Question content: Inzalo efikhsiwe ({{fixed interest rate}}) ku sivumelwano se {vehicle finance} iyisima kanjani?
Explanation: i{Interest rate} engajiki ({{fixed}}) ihlala ifana zinyanga zonke kanti ayithintwa yi {prime lending rate}

Question content: i{Interest rate} e{link}iwe ({{linked}}/{{variable}}) ihlala ifana zinyanga zonke
Explanation: i{Interest rate} engajiki ({{fixed}}) ihlala ifana zinyanga zonke kanti ayithintwa yi {prime lending rate}

Question content: Uma une {{interest rate}} efikhsiwe ({{fixed}}), ukukhokha kwakho kwazinyanga zonke kushintsha ne {prime lending rate}
Explanation: i{{Interest rate}} engajiki ({{fixed}}) ihlala ifana zinyanga zonke kanti ayithintwa yi {prime lending rate}, ngakho nokukhokha kwakho kuhlala kufana njalo ngenyanga

Question content: Hlobo luni lwe {interest rate} elishintsha ne {prime lending rate}?
Explanation: i{{Linked}}/{{variable interest rate}} iyehla inyuke uma i{prime lending rate} ikhuphuka noma yehla

Question content: i{{variable}}/{{linked interest rate}}_________
Explanation: i{{Linked}}/{{variable interest rate}} iyehla inyuke uma i{prime lending rate} ikhuphuka noma yehla

Question content: Uma une{{linked}}/{{variable interest rate}}, Ukukhokha kwakho imoto kuhlala kufana njalo ngenyanga.
Explanation: i{{Linked}}/{{variable interest rate}} iyehla inyuke uma i{prime lending rate} ikhuphuka noma yehla, ngakho ke ukukhokha kwakho kuzoshintsha nokushintsha kwe {prime lending rate}

Question content: Uma une {{linked}}/{{variable interest rate}}, ukukhokha kwakho ngenyanga kwenza njani?
Answer: Iyashintsha uma i{prime lending rate} ishintsha
Explanation: i{{Linked}}/{{variable interest rate}} iyehla inyuke uma i{prime lending rate} ikhuphuka noma yehla, ngakho ke ukukhokha kwakho kuzoshintsha nokushintsha kwe {prime lending rate}

Question content: Iyini i{{finance period}}?
Answer: Isikhathi okufanele ubhadale ngaso imoto yakho
Explanation: i{{Finance period}} isikhathi ofanele ubhadale ngaso imoto yakho. Ubude be {{finance period}} buthinta inani lemali oyikhokhayo nobuningi benzalo oyikhokhayo

Question content: i{{Finance period}} yi________
Explanation: i{{Finance period}} isikhathi ofanele ubhadale ngaso imoto yakho. Ubude be {finance period} buthinta inani lemali oyikhokhayo nobuningi benzalo oyikhokhayo

Question content: Ubude besikhathi ofanele ubhadale imoto yakho ngaso yi___________
Explanation: Ubude besikhathi ofanele ubhadale imoto yakho sibizwa ngokuthi i{finance period}

Question content: Isikweletu esikhokhwa ngesikhathi eside sikhokha kancane ngenyanga kodwa ukhokha inzalo eningi ekugcineni
Explanation: Ukukhokha imoto isikhathi eside kwehlisa ukukhokha kwezinyanga zonke kodwa ukhokha imali yenzalo eningi ngokuphelele

Question content: Nge {{finance period}} ende, ukhokha okuphansi zinyanga zonke kodwa__________
Explanation: Ukukhokha imoto isikhathi eside kwehlisa imali oyikhokhayo ngenyanga kodwa ukhokha imali yenzalo eningi ngokuphelele

Question content: Nge {{finance period}} ende ukhokha kakhulu njalo ngenyanga kodwa ukhokha inzalo encane ngokuphelele
Explanation: Ukukhokha imoto isikhathi eside kwehlisa imali oyikhokhayo ngenyanga kodwa ukhokha imali yenzalo eningi ngokuphelele

Question content: Isiphi isikhathi se {{finance period}} omele ukusikhetha kuze ukhokhe kancane ngenyanga kodwa inzalo eningi ngokuphelele?
Explanation: Ukukhokha imoto isikhathi eside (kanjengo 6 {years}) kwehlisa imali oyikhokhayo ngenyanga kodwa ukhokha imali yenzalo eningi ngokuphelele

Question content: Nge {{finance period}} emfishane, ukhokha KAKHULU ngenyanga kodwa ugcina ukhokhe inzalo encane ngokuphelele
Explanation: Ukukhokha imoto isikhathi eside kwehlisa ukukhokha kwezinyanga zonke kodwa ukhokha imali yenzalo eningi ngokuphelele

Question content: Nge {{finance period}} emfishane ukhokha KAKHULU ngenyanga kodwa_________
Explanation: Ukukhokha imoto isikhathi eside kwehlisa imali oyikhokhayo ngenyanga kodwa ukhokha imali yenzalo eningi ngokuphelele

Question content: Nge {{finance period}} emfishane ukhokha KANCANE ngenyanga kodwa ugcina ukhokhe inzalo ENKULU ekugcineni
Explanation: Ukukhokha imoto isikhathi eside kwehlisa imali oyikhokhayo ngenyanga kodwa ukhokha imali yenzalo eningi ngokuphelele

Question content: Akwenzi mehluko ukukhokhela isikweletu ngesikhathi eside noma esifushane
Explanation: Ukukhokha imoto isikhathi esifushane kunyusa imali oyikhokhayo ngenyanga kodwa ukhokha imali yenzalo encane ngokuphelele

Question content: Iyiphi i{{finance period}} ekumele uyikhethe ukukhokha KAKHULU ngenyanga kodwa ukukhokha inzalo encane ngokuphelele?
Explanation: Ukukhokha imoto isikhathi esifushane (kanjengo 4 {years}) kunyusa imali oyikhokhayo ngenyanga kodwa ukhokha imali yenzalo encane ngokuphelele

Question content: Kuyini i{{balloon payment}}?
Answer: Isamba semali esidingekayo ekupheleni kwesivumelwano sesikweletu
Explanation: i{{Balloon payment}} isamba semali esidinga ukukhokhwa ekupheleni kwesivumelwano se {vehicle finance}

Question content: i{{Balloon payment}} isamba semali esidinga ukukhokhwa__________
Explanation: i{{Balloon payment}} isamba semali esidinga ukukhokhwa ekupheleni kwesivumelwano se {vehicle finance}

Question content: i{{Balloon payment}} isamba semali esidinga ukukhokhwa ekuqaleni kwesivumelwano se {vehicle finance}
Explanation: i{{Balloon payment}} isamba semali esidinga ukukhokhwa ekupheleni kwesivumelwano se {vehicle finance}

Question content: i{{Balloon payment}} inciphisa imali ye {installment} kodwa ___________
Explanation: i{{Balloon payment}} inciphisa imali oyikhokha ngenyaga kodwa ugcina ukhokhe inzalo eningi. Unesamba semali futhi omele ukusikhokha ekupheleni kwesivumelwano

Question content: Kuyini isizathu se {{balloon payment}}?
Explanation: i{{Balloon payment}} inciphisa imali oyikhokha ngenyaga kodwa ugcina ukhokhe inzalo eningi. Unesamba semali futhi omele ukusikhokha ekupheleni kwesivumelwano

Question content: Ukuthatha i{{balloon payment}} kwehlisa inzalo oyikhokhayo
Explanation: i{{Balloon payment}} inciphisa imali oyikhokha ngenyaga kodwa ugcina ukhokhe inzalo eningi. Unesamba semali futhi omele ukusikhokha ekupheleni kwesivumelwano

Question content: i{{Balloon payment}} iphoqekile uma uthatha i{vehicle finance}
Explanation: i{{Balloon payment}} ayisiso isidingo ekutholeni isikweletu semoto. Uma ufuna ukwehlisa imali yenyanga oyikhokhayo ({installment}), kuncono ukukhipha i{deposit} noma ukukhetha imoto ebiza kancanyane

Question content: Ungakhetha ukuthi ufuna i{balloon payment} noma cha kuyi {vehicle finance} yakho
Explanation: i{{Balloon payment}} ayisiso isidingo ekutholeni isikweletu semoto. Uma ufuna ukwehlisa imali yangenyanga oyikhokhayo ({installment}), kuncono ukukhipha i{deposit} noma ukukhetha imoto ebiza kancanyane

Question content: Uma unikwa intengo yesikweletu ehamba ne {balloon payment}, uphoqekile na ukuyithatha i{balloon payment}?
Explanation: i{Balloon payment} ayisiso isidingo ekutholeni isikweletu semoto. Uma ufuna ukwehlisa imali yangenyanga oyikhokhayo ({installment}), kuncono ukukhipha i{deposit} noma ukukhetha imoto ebiza kancanyane

Question content: Kuyini i{{deposit}}
Explanation: i{{Deposit}} imali oyikhokhayo ngaphambi kokuqala kwesivumelwano se {vehicle finance}. Ikhishwa enanini lemoto okwenza ube nesikweletu esincanyane

Question content: Imali ekhokhwa ngaphambi kwentengiso yesikweletu semoto ibizwa nge___________
Explanation: i{{Deposit}} imali oyikhokhayo ngaphambi kokuqala kwesivumelwano se {vehicle finance}. Ikhishwa enanini lemoto okwenza ube nesikweletu esincanyane

Question content: Ukuba ne {{deposit}} kuyimpoqo ekutholeni isikweletu semoto ({vehicle finance})
Explanation: i{{Deposit}} ayiphoqekile ekutholeni isikweletu semoto ({vehicle finance})

Question content: Imali oyikhokha ngenyanga ({installment}) iba ncanyane uma une {{deposit}}
Explanation: Uma ukwazi ukukhokha i{{deposit}}, usalelwa yimali encanyane yesikweletu. Lokhu kwehlisa imali oyikhokhayo ngenyanga

Question content: Ukuba ne {{deposit}} kwehlisa ini?
Explanation: Uma ukwazi ukukhokha i{{deposit}}, usalelwa yimali encanyane yesikweletu. Lokhu kwehlisa imali oyikhokhayo ngenyanga

Question content: Uma ufuna ukukhokha kancane ngenyanga ({installment}), kuhlakaniphile ukubeka imali ye {{deposit}}
Explanation: Uma ukwazi ukukhokha i{{deposit}}, usalelwa yimali encanyane yesikweletu. Lokhu kwehlisa imali oyikhokhayo ngenyanga

Question content: Iyiphi inketho eyenza ube nenzalo ephansi?
Explanation: Uma ukwazi ukukhokha i{deposit}, usalelwa yimali encanyane yesikweletu. Nge {balloon payment} ugcina ukhokhe inzalo eningi

Question content: Ikhava ini i{{comprehensive car insurance}}?
Explanation: i{{Comprehensive insurance}} ikhava (ngokomshwalense) umonakalo wengozi, ukuntshontshwa ne {write}-{off}, kanye nengozi yomunye um'lingiswa uma kwenzakala ingozi

Question content: i{{Comprehensive car insurance}} umshwalense okhava imali yemoto uma kwenzeka utho kuwe
Explanation: i{CREDIT LIFE insurance} ikhava imali yakho oyikhokha ngenyanga uma kukhona okwenzakala kuwe. i{COMPREHENSIVE} ikhava imoto yakho ebugebengwini, emonakalweni wengozi, ne {write}-{off} {etc.}

Question content: Uma imoto yakho intshontshwa, ikhavwa yini?
Explanation: i{Comprehensive insurance} ikhava (ngokomshwalense) umonakalo wengozi, ukuntshontshwa ne {write}-{off}, kanye nengozi yomunye um'lingiswa uma kwenzakala ingozi

Question content: i{{Comprehensive car insurance}} ayiphoqekile esivumelwaneni se {vehicle finance}
Explanation: Umshwalense we {Comprehensive insurance} ujwayele ukuba yimpoqo esivumelwaneni sesikweletu semoto ({vehicle finance}). Uvumelekile kodwa ukuzikhethela okunika umshwalense

Question content: i{Vehicle finance} ekuyisikweletu semoto idinga ube nani?
Explanation: Umshwalense we {Comprehensive insurance} ujwayele ukuba yimpoqo esivumelwaneni sesikweletu semoto ({vehicle finance}). Uvumelekile kodwa ukuzikhethela okunika umshwalense

Question content: Umkweletisi wesikweletu semoto engaphoqa ukuthi uthathe muphi umshwalense we {comprehensive car insurance}
Explanation: Uvumelekile ukuzikhethela okunika umshwalense we {comprehensive insurance}

Question content: Ikhava ini i{{third party insurance}}?
Explanation: Umshwalense we {third}-{party} ukhava umonakalo womuntu osengozini naye kuphela

Question content: i{{Third party insurance} ingumshwalense ofana ne {{comprehensive insurance}}
Explanation: Umshwalense we {third}-{party} ukhava umonakalo womuntu osengozini naye kuphela. i{Comprehensive insurance} yona ikhava izicelo ze {third}-{party}, umonakalo wengozi, ukuntshontshwa ne {write}-{off}

Question content: i{{Comprehensive insurance}} iyazikhava yini izinkinga ze {third}-{party} (umlingiswa engozini)?
Explanation: i{Comprehensive insurance} umshwalense okhava izicelo ze {third}-{party}, umonakalo wengozi, ukuntshontshwa ne {write}-{off}

Question content: i{{Credit life insurance}} ayiphoqi umuntu kodwa umkweletisi wemali yemoto engadinga kuwe ube nayo
Explanation: Umshwalense we {credit life} awsiyo impoqo ngokomthetho esivumelwaneni sesikweletu semoto ({vehicle finance}). Uvumelekile ukuzikhethela umthengisi womshwalense

Question content: Kukuwena ukuthi uyafuna yini ukuthatha i{{credit life insurance}}
Explanation: Umkweletisi engakudinga ube ne {credit life insurance} kuze ezokukweletisela imoto, kodwa khumbula ukuthi akavumelekile ukukuphoqa ukuthi uthathe umthengisi womshwalense othile, ungazikhethela wena

Question content: Ungazikhethela yini umthengisi wakho we {{credit life insurance}}?
Explanation: Umkweletisi engakudinga ube ne {credit life insurance} kuze ezokukweletisela imoto, kodwa khumbula ukuthi akavumelekile ukukuphoqa ukuthi uthathe umthengisi womshwalense othile, ungazikhethela wena

Question content: i{{Shortfall insurance}} ikhava umehluko phakathi kwemali oyikhokhelwa ngumshwalense kanye nemali osayikweletayo esikweletini
Explanation: Uma imoto yakho iba yi {write}-{off} ngengozi noma intshontshwa, i{shortfall insurance} ikhava umehluko phakathi kwemali yomshwalense wakho kanye nemali osayikweletayo

Question content: i{{Shortfall insurance}} ikhava umehluko phakathi kwemali oyikhokhelwa ngumshwalense kanye nani?
Explanation: Uma imoto yakho iba yi {write}-{off} ngengozi noma intshontshwa, i{shortfall insurance} ikhava umehluko phakathi kwemali yomshwalense wakho kanye nemali osayikweletayo

Question content: i{{Shortfall insurance}} ikhava umehluko phakathi kwemali osayikweletayo emotweni kanye nani?
Explanation: Uma imoto yakho iba yi {write}-{off} ngengozi noma intshontshwa, i{shortfall insurance} ikhava umehluko phakathi kwemali yomshwalense wakho kanye nemali osayikweletayo

Question content: Mshwalense muni okhava umehluko phakathi kwemali umshwalense wakho okukhokhela yona kanye nemali osayikweleta emotweni?
Explanation: Uma imoto yakho iba yi {write}-{off} ngengozi noma intshontshwa, i{shortfall insurance} ikhava umehluko phakathi kwemali yomshwalense wakho kanye nemali osayikweletayo

Question content: i{{Warranty}} ikhava umonakalo obangwa yizinkinga ezenzakale ekukhiqizeni imoto
Explanation: i{Manufacture warranty} ekuyi {warranty} yomkhiqizi ikhava umonakalo owenziwa ngamaphutha enzeke ekukhiqizweni kwemoto. Ayikhavi ukuguga kwemoto okubangwa ngumshayeli

Question content: Yini ekhava izinkinga ezikhandwe ngamaphutha omkhiqizi?
Explanation: i{Manufacture warranty} ekuyi {warranty} yomkhiqizi ikhava umonakalo owenziwa ngamaphutha enzeke ekukhiqizweni kwemoto. Ayikhavi ukuguga kwemoto okubangwa ngumshayeli

Question content: i{{Warranty}} iyakukhava yini ukuguga kwemoto?
Explanation: i{Manufacture warranty} ekuyi {warranty} yomkhiqizi ikhava umonakalo owenziwa ngamaphutha enzeke ekukhiqizweni kwemoto. Ayikhavi ukuguga kwemoto okubangwa ngumshayeli

Question content: i{{Warranty}} iyawukhava yini umonakalo wengozi?
Explanation: i{Manufacture warranty} ekuyi {warranty} yomkhiqizi ikhava umonakalo owenziwa ngamaphutha enzeke ekukhiqizweni kwemoto. Ayikhavi ukuguga kwemoto okubangwa ngumshayeli

Question content: Uma uthenga imoto entsha izoba ne {{warranty}}
Explanation: Imoto entsha iphuma ne {manufacture warranty} kodwa iyaphela ngokuhamba kwesikhathi

Question content: Udinga ukuthenga i{{warranty}} ukuthola isikweletu semoto ekuyi {vehicle finance}
Explanation: Imoto entsha iphuma ne {manufacture warranty}, awudingi ukuyithenga eceleni. Imoto esisebenzile ungakhetha ukuthola i{warranty} ehamba yodwa

Question content: Uma uthenga imoto entsha, i{{warranty}} yayo ibakhona impilo yemoto yonke
Explanation: Imoto entsha iphuma ne {manufacture warranty} kodwa iyaphela ngokuhamba kwesikhathi

Question content: Uma ushayela imoto ethengwe ngesikweletu ngaphandle kwezwe, uyayidinga yini i{{border letter}} namaphepha okurejista?
Explanation: Ukushayela imoto ethengwe ngesikweletu ngaphandle kwemincele yase {South Africa} udinga incwadi evela ebhange, izincwadi zemoto ({NaTIS}) kanye ne {proof} yomshwalense ngaphandle

Question content: Awuyidinga i{{border letter}} namaphepha okurejista uma ushayela imoto yesikweletu ngaphandle kwe {South Africa}
Explanation: Ukushayela imoto ethengwe ngesikweletu ngaphandle kwemincele yase {South Africa} udinga incwadi evela ebhange, izincwadi zemoto ({NaTIS}) kanye ne {proof} yomshwalense ngaphandle

Question content: Uma ushayela imoto ethengwe ngesikweletu ngaphandle kwezwe, uyayidinga ini?
Explanation: Ukushayela imoto ethengwe ngesikweletu ngaphandle kwemincele yase {South Africa} udinga incwadi evela ebhange, izincwadi zemoto ({NaTIS}) kanye ne {proof} yomshwalense ngaphandle

Question content: i{{Principal debt}} imali yesikweleu oyikweletayo, kungakangeni nzalo nezinye izimali
Explanation: i{Principal debt} imali yesikweleu oyikweletayo ukuthenga imoto, kungakangeni nzalo nezinye izimali

Question content: Kuyini i{{principal debt}}?
Explanation: i{{Principal debt}} imali yesikweletu oyikweletayo, kungakangeni nzalo nezinye izimali

Question content: Imali oyibolekayo ukuthenga imoto ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{{Principal debt}} imali yesikweletu oyikweletayo, kungakangeni nzalo nezinye izimali

Question content: i{{Principal debt}} ayikafaki inzalo
Explanation: i{{Principal debt}} imali yesikweletu oyikweletayo, kungakangeni nzalo nezinye izimali

Question content: i{{Capital balance}} imali ye {principal debt} ongakayikhokhi
Explanation: i{Capital balance} inani lemali osayikweletayo kuyi {principal debt} ekuyi nani lemoto

Question content: i{{Capital balance}} imali osayikweletayo esivumelwaneni sesikweletu semoto ngokuphelele
Explanation: i{CONTRACT balance} isamba semali osasikweletayo. i{CAPITAL balance} imali osayikweleta kuyi {principal debt} ekuyi nani lemoto kungakangeni nzalo

Question content: Uma i{{capital balance}} yakho kungu R100,000, lemali akusiyo nje imali odinga ukuyikhokha
Explanation: i{CAPITAL balance} inani lemali osayikweletayo kuyi {principal debt} ekuyi nani lemoto kungakangeni nzalo. i{CONTRACT balance} isamba semali osasikweletayo

Question content: i{{Capital balance}} imali osadinga ukukhokhela yona imoto ngokuphelele
Explanation: i{Contract balance} isamba semali osasikweletayo esivumelwaneni sesikweletu, ekuyi mali yesikweletu semoto ({principal balance}) kanye nenzalo nezinye izimali

Question content: Kuyini i{{contract balance}} esivumelwaneni sesikweletu semoto ({vehicle finance agreement})?
Explanation: i{Contract balance} isamba semali osasikweletayo esivumelwaneni sesikweletu, ekuyi mali yesikweletu semoto ({principal balance}) kanye nenzalo nezinye izimali

Question content: Uma i{{contract balance}} yakho kungu R270,000, akuyona imali osayikweletayo lena
Explanation: i{Contract balance} isamba semali osasikweletayo esivumelwaneni sesikweletu. Uma i{contract balance} yakho kungu R270,000, ileyo imali oyikweletayo

Question content: Uma i{{contract balance}} yakho kungu R150,000, imali osayikweletayo leyo esikweletini semoto
Explanation: i{Contract balance} isamba semali osasikweletayo esivumelwaneni sesikweletu, ekuyi mali yesikweletu semoto ({principal balance}) kanye nenzalo nezinye izimali

Question content: Kuyini i{{depreciation}}?
Explanation: i{Depreciation} imangabe inani lemoto yakho lehla ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, okusho ukuthi angeke ukwazi ukuyidayisa leyo moto ngenani oyithenge ngalo

Question content: Ukwehla kwenani lemoto yakho ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kubizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{Depreciation} imangabe inani lemoto yakho lehla ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, okusho ukuthi angeke ukwazi ukuyidayisa leyo moto ngenani oyithenge ngalo

Question content: i{{Depreciation}} ayishintshi inani lemoto yakho uma uyi {trade}-{in}a
Explanation: Angeke ukwazi ukuyidayisa imoto yakho ngenani oyithenge ngalo ngoba yehlelwa yinani ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ({depreciation})

Question content: Uyakwazi yini ukudayisa imoto ngenani oyithenge ngalo?
Explanation: Angeke ukwazi ukuyidayisa imoto yakho ngenani oyithenge ngalo ngoba yehlelwa yinani ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ({depreciation})

Question content: Imoto esisebenzile ({second}-{hand}) ayithintwa yi{{depreciation}}
Explanation: Imoto esisebenzile ({second}-{hand}) IYEHLA ngenani ngokuhamba kwesikhathi (iya {depreciate}a), kodwa ngesilinganiso ({rate}) esincanyane kunemoto entsha

Question content: Izimoto ezintsha kuphela ezithintwa yi {{depreciation}}
Explanation: Imoto esisebenzile ({second}-{hand}) IYEHLA ngenani ngokuhamba kwesikhathi (iya {depreciate}a), kodwa ngesilinganiso ({rate}) esincanyane kunemoto entsha

Question content: Ungayigwema i{{depreciation}} ngokuthenga imoto esisebenzile ({used}}/{{second}}-{{hand})
Explanation: Imoto esisebenzile ({second}-{hand}) IYEHLA ngenani ngokuhamba kwesikhathi (iya {{depreciate}}a), kodwa ngesilinganiso ({rate}) esincanyane kunemoto entsha

Question content: Yini engathinta ukwehla kwentengo yemoto ({{depreciation}})?
Explanation: Ezinye izimoto zehla ngokushesha kunezinye, umonakalo ungenza inani lehle kakhulu kanti futhi izimoto ezintsha zehla kakhulu kunezindala

Question content: Amanye ama {model} nama {make} ezimoto ehla intengo kakhulu kunamanye
Explanation: Ezinye izimoto zehla ngokushesha kunezinye

Question content: Uma imoto yakho iba sengozini, intengo yayo angeke isehla
Explanation: Umonakalo ungenza inani lemoto lehle kakhulu

Question content: Kusho ukuthini ukuba kuma {{arrears}} esikweletini sakho semoto?
Explanation: Uma ungakhokhi ngisho nenyanga eyodwa nje, umkweletisi wakho engakufaka kuma {arrears} okuyichashaza egameni lakho, kanti futhi ahamba nenzalo

Question content: Ukuba kuma {{arrears}} kusho ukuthi ukhokha imali eningi ngokwephutha
Explanation: Uma ungakhokhi ngisho nenyanga eyodwa nje, umkweletisi wakho engakufaka kuma {arrears} okuyichashaza egameni lakho, kanti futhi ahamba nenzalo

Question content: Awubi kuma {{arrears}} uma ukhokhe imali {late} ngosuku olulodwa (oluyi 1)
Explanation: Uma ukhokha ngisho usuku oluyi 1 {late}, umkweletisi wakho engakufaka kuma {arrears} okuyichashaza egameni lakho, kanti futhi ahamba nenzalo

Question content: Kuyini inzalo yama {{arrears}} ngokwesikweletu semoto ({vehicle finance})?
Explanation: Uma ukuma {arrears} ({ushoda ngokukhokha kwemali ngokwesivumelwano}), umkweletisi wakho engakushaja inzalo yama {arrears} nezinye izimali zama {admin}({default administration charges})

Question content: Ibhange lakho alivumelekile ukukushaja inzalo engaphezulu kanye nezimali ze {admin} uma ukuma {{arrears}}
Explanation: Uma ukuma {arrears} ({ushoda ngokukhokha kwemali ngokwesivumelwano}), umkweletisi wakho engakushaja inzalo yama {arrears} nezinye izimali zama {admin}({default administration charges})

Question content: Uma istatmende sakho sikhombisa ama {{arrears}}, kusho ukuthini?
Explanation: Uma ukuma {arrears} ({ushoda ngokukhokha kwemali ngokwesivumelwano}), umkweletisi wakho engakushaja inzalo yama {arrears} nezinye izimali zama {admin}({default administration charges})

Question content: Uyakwazi yini uku qeda ({settle}/{pay}-{off}) isikweletu semoto kungakapheli isikhathi sesivumelwano ({finance period})?
Explanation: Ngokwenjwayelo, ungasikhokha sonke isikweletu semoto kungakafiki isikhathi sokuqeda isivumelwano kodwa ungakhokhiswa imali yesigwebo ({penalty})

Question content: Uma ukhokhela imali esisele ({{settle}}) esikweletini kungakapheli isikhathi ungakhokha imali yesigwebo ({penalty})
Explanation: Ngokwenjwayelo, ungasikhokha sonke isikweletu semoto kungakafiki isikhathi sokuqeda isivumelwano kodwa ungakhokhiswa imali yesigwebo ({penalty})

Question content: Kwenzekani uma ukhokha yonke imali ({{settle}}) esikweletini semoto kungakapheli isikhathi sesivumelwano sesikweletu?
Explanation: Ngokwenjwayelo, ungasikhokha sonke isikweletu semoto kungakafiki isikhathi sokuqeda isivumelwano kodwa ungakhokhiswa imali yesigwebo ({penalty})

Question content: Uma ukhokhela imali esisele esikweletini semoto kungakapheli isikhathi, uyayidinga i{{settlement quote}}?
Explanation: Uma ufuna ukuqeda isikweletu singakapheli isikhathi sesivumelwano ungacela umkweletisi akunike i{quote} ekuyimali okuzomele uyikhokhe. Ingaba nkulu kunenani lemali esele ngoba ungashajwa isigwebo

Question content: Uma ufuna ukhokhela imali esisele esikweletini semoto kungakapheli isikhathi, udinga ukucela ini?
Explanation: Uma ufuna ukuqeda isikweletu singakapheli isikhathi sesivumelwano ungacela umkweletisi akunike i{quote} ekuyimali okuzomele uyikhokhe. Ingaba nkulu kunenani lemali esele ngoba ungashajwa isigwebo

Question content: i{{Settlement quote}} yakho iyohlale ilingana ne {contract balance} okuyimali osayikweletayo esikweletini
Explanation: Imali ye {settlement} ekuyimali yokuqeda isikweletu ingaba nkulu kunenani lemali esele ngoba ungashajwa isigwebo

Question content: i{{Break}}-{{even point}} yilapha imoto yakho osayikhokhelayo ibiza imali ecishe ilingane nesikweletu sakho kuyona
Explanation: i{{Break}}-{{even point}} yilapha usukhokhe imali emotweni ukuze inani lemoto yakho lizolingana nemali osayikweletayo emotweni

Question content: Uma imoto yakho icishe ibize imali osayikweletayo kuyo, kubizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{{Break}}-{{even point}} yilapha usukhokhe imali emotweni ukuze inani lemoto yakho lizolingana nemali osayikweletayo emotweni

Question content: Kuyini i{{break}}-{{even point}} esivumelwaneni sesikweletu semoto?
Explanation: i{{Break}}-{{even point}} yilapha usukhokhe imali emotweni ukuze inani lemoto yakho lizolingana nemali osayikweletayo emotweni

Question content: Ingena kuphi i{{break}}-{{even point}} esivumelwaneni sesikweletu semoto?
Explanation: i{{Break}}-{{even point}} yilapha usukhokhe imali emotweni ukuze inani lemoto yakho lizolingana nemali osayikweletayo emotweni

Question content: Uma uthengisa imoto yakho ngaphambili kokulingana nesiwkeletu esisele, ungathola imali yokuqeda isikweletu
Explanation: Uma uthengisa imoto yakho ingakafiki kuyi {break}-{even point}, angeke uthole imali eyanele yokuqeda isikweletu sayo ngoba ukweleta imali eningi kunenani lemoto

Question content: Uma uthengisa imoto yakho ngemuva kokulingana nesikweletu esisele, ungathola imali yokuqeda isikweletu
Explanation: Uma uthengisa imoto yakho seyidlulile i{break}-{even point}, inani layo licishe lilingane nemali osayikweletayo emotweni

Question content: Uma uthola imoto engcono, ungavala isivumelwano sesikweletu ungasikhokhele ngokugcwele?
Explanation: Isivumelwano sesikweletu semoto isivumelwano somthetho sokukhokha imali oyikweletayo ngisho ungashintsha umqondo ngesikweletu, ok'shuthi usakweleta ngisho usivala isikweletu

Question content: Ungasivala isivumelwano sesikweletu semoto ungakaqedi ukukhokhela imoto uma ungasayifuni imoto
Explanation: Isivumelwano sesikweletu semoto isivumelwano somthetho sokukhokha imali oyikweletayo ngisho ungashintsha umqondo ngesikweletu, ok'shuthi usakweleta ngisho usivala isikweletu

Question content: Uma usayina isivumelwano sesikweletu semoto, kumele usikhokhele usiqede kuze uzovala isikweletu semoto, ngisho ungasafuni ukukhokha
Explanation: Isivumelwano sesikweletu semoto isivumelwano somthetho sokukhokha imali oyikweletayo ngisho ungashintsha umqondo ngesikweletu, ok'shuthi usakweleta ngisho usivala isikweletu

Question content: Uma usakhokhela imoto yakho, ingeyebhange
Explanation: Umkweletisi wakho ubhaliswa njengomnini moto uma ungakaqedi ukukhokhela isikweletu sayo. Uma usuqedile ukukhokha, imoto ingena egameni lakho

Question content: Imoto eyakho na uma usayikhokhela?
Explanation: Umkweletisi wakho ubhaliswa njengomnini moto uma ungakaqedi ukukhokhela isikweletu sayo. Uma usuqedile ukukhokha, imoto ingena egameni lakho

Question content: Uma usuqedile ukukhokhela imoto uba ngumninimoto (iba ngeyakho)
Explanation: Umkweletisi wakho ubhaliswa njengomnini moto uma ungakaqedi ukukhokhela isikweletu sayo. Uma usuqedile ukukhokha, imoto ingena egameni lakho

Question content: Uma usuqedile ukukhokhela imoto uba ngumninimoto (iba ngeyakho) ungenzanga lutho wena
Explanation: Kungumsebenzi wakho ukurejista imoto egameni lakho uma usuqedile ukukhokhela isikweletu sayo

Question content: Kumele urejiste imoto egameni lakho uma usuqedile ukuyikhokhela
Explanation: Kungumsebenzi wakho ukurejista imoto egameni lakho uma usuqedile ukukhokhela isikweletu sayo

Question content: Uma usuqedile ukukhokhela imoto ungacela umkweletisi eyifake egameni lakho
Explanation: Kungumsebenzi wakho ukurejista imoto egameni lakho uma usuqedile ukukhokhela isikweletu sayo
